Flow.description: Updates Product Line Lookup on OPC when a picklist value of Product Line old is selected

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formula_myRule_13
formula_myRule_15
formula_myRule_17
formula_myRule_19

formula_myRule_27
formula_myRule_3
formula_myRule_31
formula_myRule_35
formula_myRule_37
formula_myRule_5
formula_myRule_7

value.stringValue: AND( NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity_Product_Component__c].Product_Line__c)) ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Opportunity_Product_Component__c].Product_Line__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity_Product_Component__c].Product_Line__c, 'Intapp Open - Experience'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity_Product_Component__c].Product_Line__c, 'Third Party Product - Replicated'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity_Product_Component__c].Product_Line__c, 'Third Party Product - Experience') ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Product_Line__c})) ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Product_Line__c}) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Product_Line__c}, 'Intapp Open - Experience'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Product_Line__c}, 'Third Party Product - Replicated'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Product_Line__c}, 'Third Party Product - Experience') ) )

Flow.label: Update Product Line LKP on Opportunity Product Component
